tool_description: Cross-validates property characteristics across multiple data sources to identify discrepancies and ensure accuracy of collected property information.

property_records.description: Array of property data records from different sources

critical_fields.description: List of property fields to validate (e.g., square_footage, bedrooms, year_built)

tolerance_percentages.description: Acceptable variance percentages for numerical fields in same order as critical_fields

validation_level.description: Validation strictness level: basic, standard, or strict

error_messages: Insufficient data sources: At least 2 property records are required for validation.
Invalid critical fields: One or more specified fields are not recognized property characteristics.
Tolerance mismatch: Number of tolerance_percentages must match number of critical_fields if provided.
Invalid validation level: Validation level must be one of [basic, standard, strict].
Tolerance out of range: Tolerance percentages must be between 0 and 50.
Data format error: Property records must be in proper format for comparison.
usage: Provide multiple property data records and specify which fields to validate. Optionally set tolerance levels for numerical comparisons and choose validation strictness.

field_consistency.description: Consistency status for each validated field

discrepancies.description: List of identified discrepancies with details

confidence_score.description: Overall confidence score for property data accuracy (0-100)

recommended_values.description: Recommended values for fields with discrepancies
